shopping-list works!

Enter the recipe name

Enter descrpition

Upload the recipe Image

id name descrpition Image image path
{{ nm.id }} {{ nm.name1 }} {{ nm.desc1 }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ListService } from '../list.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shopping-list', templateUrl: './shopping-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shopping-list.component.css'] }) export class ShoppingListComponent implements OnInit{ public url: any; msg = "uploaded"; selectFile(event: any) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(event.target.files[0]); reader.onload = (_event) => { this.msg = ""; this.url = reader.result; } } public name:string=''; public desc:string=''; public recipelist:any=[]; constructor(private recipeservice:ListService){} getlistservice(){ this.name=this.recipeservice.name; this.desc=this.recipeservice.description; this.url=this.recipeservice.url; this.recipelist=this.recipeservice.add(); } ngOnInit(): void { this.getlistservice() } /*public name:any; public desc:any; public list:any=[] public rimg:any; url: any; msg = "uploaded"; selectFile(event: any) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(event.target.files[0]); reader.onload = (_event) => { this.msg = ""; this.url = reader.result; } } add(nm:string){ this.list.push({id:this.list.length+1,name1:this.name,desc1:this.desc,img:this.url}); }*/ }
